meanings.definition: The quality of requiring great effort or endurance.
meanings.sent1: The arduousness of climbing the steep mountain exhausted the hiker.
meanings.sent2: The arduousness of the task made him sweat profusely.
meanings.sent3: The arduousness of untangling Christmas lights always puts me in a tangle!
meanings.sent4: The arduousness of the journey felt like carrying a heavy burden.
meanings.sent5: The arduousness of the workout left her muscles sore for days.

meanings.definition: The state of being difficult or strenuous.
meanings.sent1: She felt the arduousness of the long and challenging exam.
meanings.sent2: The arduousness of the negotiation process wore him out.
meanings.sent3: The arduousness of finding a needle in a haystack is nothing compared to this!
meanings.sent4: The arduousness of the situation weighed heavily on his mind.
meanings.sent5: The arduousness of the project demanded all of their attention and effort.
